title: Application form - Marianne Initiative for Human Rights Defenders - Class of 2024 (January-July)
description:
Use this form to apply to take part in the Marianne Initiative welcome and support programme from January to July 2024.

The Marianne initiative for human rights defenders aims to provide better support for human rights defenders in their fight (www.initiativemarianne.fr). 

The hosting programme in France provides for an accommodation near Paris, the payment of a monthly grant to cover daily needs, personalised support, and networking with Human Rights Defenders for a period of 6 months. After the 6 months, participants no longer benefit from the grant, the accommodation and the support provided in the programme.

Participation is individual and does not provide for the winner to be accompanied by their family.

Copy of your professional card if relevant (lawyer's professional card, journalist's professional card, etc.).
Explain the reasons for your application and the prospects you expect from participating in the Marianne Initiative programme and the personal project you wish to develop.
champDescriptors.description:
•	What are the expected objectives and results? What skills do you wish to develop? 
•	What specific project do you wish to carry out throughout the programme? 
•	What activities and contacts will you benefit from under the Marianne Initiative programme and how will they strengthen your action? 

(max. 1,000 words)

champDescriptors.label: Specify your links (existing or that you wish to create) with French or international Human Rights organisations.
champDescriptors.description: (max. 500 words)

champDescriptors.label: Please describe any security risks you are or may be facing.
champDescriptors.description:
•	Are you facing security risks in your work as a Human Rights Defender? If so, for what reasons? How do they affect your activities? How would the programme reduce these risks? 
•	Please specify the type of threats, the perpetrators, and any evidence.

(max. 500 words)

champDescriptors.label: Please provide contact information for at least two reference persons who can support your application.
champDescriptors.description: These reference persons should be familiar with your Human Rights work, whether at local, national, or international level, and be able to attest to this to the Marianne Initiative if necessary. Please provide their telephone numbers and/or e-mail addresses so that these people can be contacted.

champDescriptors.label: Is there any specific information in your application that should be kept confidential?
champDescriptors.description:
If so, the Marianne Initiative will not disclose any personal information to any party outside the Initiative. 

For more information on our confidentiality practices, or if you wish to make a complaint, please contact us by email using the contact form on the www.initiativemarianne.fr website. Applications must be submitted via the Démarches Simplifiées platform.

champDescriptors.label: Are you willing to speak publicly about your experience or the Human Rights situation in your country to the extent that your security situation permits?
champDescriptors.description: Public speaking is not a requirement to take part to the programme.

champDescriptors.label: Please indicate any additional information that is important for the consideration of your application.
Is participation in the programme and the availability it implies (from January to early July 2024) fully compatible with your personal and professional situation?
champDescriptors.description: NB: It is possible to continue your professional activity as long as this does not prevent you from participating in the programme diligently (see e.g.: example of a typical week in the Appendix Practical information notice).
